name: Flaviar
headline: Try-at-home service for fine spirits
description: Flaviar, a spirits tasting club, offers a subscription service that helps members discover new liquor products through sample tasting packs. Every month, subscribers receive a tasting kit featuring 3 samples of spirits that have been sourced from across the globe.

### Flaviar: A Gateway to Global Spirits

**Overview:**  
Flaviar is a New York-based company founded in 2012, notable for being part of Y Combinator Batch S14. Their mission? To make fine spirits accessible through their unique "try-at-home" service. With a team of about 60 employees, Flaviar is crafting a niche for itself in the liquor marketplace.

**What They Do:**  
Initially launching as a spirits tasting club, Flaviar has perfected the art of discovery through subscription services. Subscribers receive a monthly tasting kit that includes three curated samples of spirits sourced from around the globe. This not only introduces members to new flavors but fosters a community of spirits enthusiasts eager to explore the vast world of distillation.

**Subscription Perks:**  
Members have access to a wide range of products, including whiskies, bourbons, rums, gins, and unique themed tasting boxes tailored to various occasions. The company also promotes gifting options, making it easy to share the joy of premium spirits with friends and family.

**Engagement Strategies:**
Flaviar leverages community engagement through events like "Bourbon-of-the-Month" clubs and limited edition releases—often a little more special for their "Flaviar Black" members, who enjoy perks like exclusive pricing and early access to rare bottles.

**Why Flaviar Matters:**  
Flaviar's approach is all about personalization and exploration. They cater not just to connoisseurs but also to newcomers in the world of spirits. This accessibility, matched with a sense of adventure in tasting—who wouldn’t want to discover new favorites directly from the comfort of home?—is what sets Flaviar apart in the ever-expanding food-and-beverage marketplace.

For more information, check out their website: [Flaviar](https://flaviar.com).

### Conclusion
If you're someone who enjoys a good drink, Flaviar makes it easy and exciting to explore the diverse world of spirits. With their curated selections and innovative tasting kits, they combine the thrill of discovery with the comforts of home—an enticing offer for any spirits lover.
